name: Protectoid
overview: An alien mothership looms above the Earth's surface, dropping deadly alien mines. It is up to you, the cybernetic hero, Protectiod (Half man, half machine) to fly through the earth and blast those deadly mines. Collect power ups to gain more ability to attack those alien mines. There is a protective shield, but sadly that will not last an eternity, because if a mine hits it, the shield gets weakened. Defend your city and avoid contact with those mines. Released for the Minigame Competition 2005 - 4K Category.
